name: Modern World Warship Combat 3D
description:
Modern World War Combat 3D is an RPG shooter attractive. Super nice graphics playing extremely impressive here is considered to be the best shooter in 2016. Test and improve your knowledge of modern world warships combat 3d.Play with millions of online players from all over the world. Show no mercy to the enemy! Lead your Nation to the GLORY of the victory!

Is single player your thing? Then step into a world on the brink of agnostic and shoot your way out of one fearful situation after another to injured a crazy who’s trying to tear the world to rips.World Domination is now within your grasp! Join a faction and join the fight in Modern World Warship Combat 3D, the popular combat game where you faceoff against enemies for control of country after country,until you rule ‘em all.Taking over the world isn’t for the weak.

Build strength in numbers by teaming up with other players and pooling rewards from individual missions. Then, declare war against rival factions during thsi World Domination events for the chance to put your name on the map—literally. Because in Modern World Warship Combat 3D, it’s not enough to want power. You have to take it.

How to play:
- Move the Iphone Touch left and right to change the direction of Warship.
- Build your battle-hardened troops with Tank, Boats, Launcher, Mech and etc to crash your enemy.
- Trade strategic resources in a real-time online marketplace.
- Upgrade buildings, research technology to strengthen your Nation!
-Buy a much stronger warship in the your battlefield with your saved country.

Commander, you must lead our Nation to strength,The fate of the Nation is in your hands now! Lead vast army to conquer all of the world and establish a glorious World.There are enemies who have powerful warships and weapons in each zone. As you defend an attack by the enemies, you’ll get stronger. We hope you win by understanding the features of each Warship.

Feature:
- Strategize and Shoot!
- High quality 3D graphics
- Fun and addictive game
- Great game that is always getting better
- Attack rivals for control of countries and territories
- Go to adventure in game and complete mission
